title: frozen in ranked game
body: hi, i'm stuck in a ranked game it's at 60 mins now it froze at 45 mins. everyone is frozen. my duo tried to reconnect but says game crashed and he can't reconnect. wot do we do? lolnexus shows game still going. we can't queue a new one. we're just all stuck....

replies.body:
Possibly a ghost game. Should resolve after a day, so no worries.

Server-side issue.
